content:
Very happy to announce the publishing of the FHIR R4 IG called C-CDA on FHIR v1.1.0. This is an STU update which advances the prior work on FHIR R3 to now be expressed for FHIR R4.

Big thanks from the CDA Community to @Rick Geimer and @Grahame Grieve for getting this important IG published.

Find the published IG here: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ccda/STU1.1/
